column5: Am I the only one that is excited about the B.A.S.S classic?!?

A few of us have been watching all day. I even got up early enough to have coffee before things got going. So far it looks pretty interesting, and it should be a entertaining weigh in. Especially since we all know basstrakk is horribly inaccurate
Is that the derby in the States?
They still have thoughs?
Your jocking right!?!?!?!?!?!?!?
GB's son plays hockey, but I'm not sure if he has a jock or not?  Pro Bass tourney... right up there with watching golf for me. Participating would be another deal, but watching.. not so much.
almost time for weigh ins. I wanna see what Ike is hiding
Is there a live stream guys?
http://sports.espn.g...ssic/live/index
Thanks  buccaneer.
It don't look good for KVD in day one
Is it not on tv tonite?
Its too bad its not a tourney for real fish. Bass are ghey........  S.
No they're not!!! They're Super Ghey!!!!!
Sorry but I don't see you in a tourney for that much $!!!
Man, thats alot of small fish. I am enjoying the tourny and the great hype with the drive in,but after watching the Simcoe BPS Open ,this thing blows. Sry.
Agree 100% Wayne sorta like watching darts or poker!!!
Darts yeah,but poker,,,Ya got to have the right players playing.
I don't see those bass guys fishing for any real fish  If enough guys could catch fish, other than bass, maybe we would have a tourney? Lets try something with teeth, just for fun  S.
Looks like KVD is geting up there again this year
LOVE IT!!! Muskie Tournies... I'd be all over that!
Guys it you have no interest in this post then move on to the next one!  THANKS
I'll move on, right after I call the WAAAAAAmbulance  You bass guys are so thin skinned. Suck it up buttercup  S.
I think so.
